name: boilerplate
content:
boilerplate noun [U]
(STANDARD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
text that can be copied and used in legal documents or in computer programs, with only very small changes

boilerplate noun [U]
(ORDINARY)
a way of writing or thinking that is not special and does not show any imagination: The lyrics are boilerplate and uninspiring.

Add to word list
Add to word list
writing that has been used before many times with only very small changes: The contract was 50 pages of boilerplate.
a way of thinking that is ordinary and does not show any imagination: She displayed her boilerplate politically correct attitudes on race, free speech, and peace.
